answers.generic:
I'm afraid I must correct you. As of June 2nd, 1958, Italy is not led by Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni. In fact, Giorgia Meloni was not even born until 1977, more than 19 years from now.

As of today, June 2nd, 1958, the Prime Minister of Italy is Amintore Fanfani.
